report.description: Report for the extra costs depends on conference.xml

queryDetail.value:
SELECT DISTINCT PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AS AttendeeKey, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_short_name_c AS AttendeeName, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_class_c AS AttendeeClass,
PUB_p_person.p_gender_c AS Gender, PUB_p_person.p_date_of_birth_d AS Birthday, PUB_p_person.p_first_name_c AS FirstName, PUB_p_person.p_prefered_name_c AS PreferredName, PUB_p_person.p_family_name_c AS LastName, PUB_p_person.p_marital_status_c AS MaritalStatus,
PUB_p_unit.p_unit_name_c AS ConferenceName, PUB_p_unit.p_partner_key_n AS ConferenceKey, ChargedUnit.p_unit_name_c AS ChargedOffice, PUB_pc_conference.pc_start_d AS StartDate, PUB_pc_conference.pc_end_d AS EndDate,
PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_arrival_d AS ArrivalDate, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_arrival_hour_i, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_arrival_minute_i, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_departure_d AS DepartureDate, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_departure_hour_i, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_departure_minute_i, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pt_arrival_point_code_c, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_arrival_comments_c AS ArrivalComment, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pt_departure_point_code_c, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_departure_comments_c AS DepartureComment, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_arrival_exp_d AS ArrivalExpectedDate, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_arrival_exp_hour_i, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_arrival_exp_minute_i, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_departure_exp_d AS DepartureExpectedDate, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_departure_exp_hour_i, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_departure_exp_minute_i, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_to_cong_travel_info_c AS ArrivalTravelDetails, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_from_cong_travel_info_c AS DepartureTravelDetails, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pt_travel_type_to_cong_code_c AS ArrivalTravelType, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pt_travel_type_from_cong_code_c AS DepartureTravelType, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_arrival_transport_needed_l, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_departure_transport_needed_l, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_confirmed_option_code_c AS OutreachCode, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_st_congress_code_c AS ConferenceRole, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_st_fg_code_c AS FellowshipGroup, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_st_fg_leader_l,
PUB_pc_attendee.pc_discovery_group_c AS DiscoveryGroup, PUB_pc_attendee.pc_work_group_c AS WorkGroup, PUB_pc_attendee.pc_arrival_group_c AS ArrivalGroup, PUB_pc_attendee.pc_departure_group_c AS DepartureGroup, PUB_pc_attendee.pc_registered_d AS RegistrationDate, PUB_pc_attendee.pc_actual_arr_d AS ActualArrivingDate, PUB_pc_attendee.pc_actual_dep_d AS ActualDepartureDate,
PUB_pc_extra_cost.pc_cost_type_code_c AS CostType, PUB_pc_extra_cost.pc_cost_amount_n AS Amount, PUB_pc_extra_cost.pc_authorising_field_n AS AuthorisingFieldKey, PUB_pc_extra_cost.pc_authorising_person_c AS AuthorisingPerson, PUB_pc_extra_cost.pc_comment_c AS CostTypeComment, AuthorisingUnit.p_unit_name_c AS AuthorisingField FROM PUB_p_partner, PUB_p_person, PUB_p_unit, PUB_p_unit AS ChargedUnit, PUB_p_unit AS AuthorisingUnit, PUB_pc_attendee, PUB_pc_conference, PUB_pm_general_application, PUB_pm_short_term_application, PUB_pc_extra_cost

, PUB_m_extract, PUB_m_extract_master WHERE PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n = PUB_m_extract.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_m_extract.m_extract_id_i = PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_id_i AND PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_name_c = {param_extractname} AND

AND PUB_p_unit.p_partner_key_n = PUB_pc_attendee.pc_conference_key_n AND ChargedUnit.p_partner_key_n = PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_st_field_charged_n AND PUB_pm_short_term_application.p_partner_key_n = PUB_pc_attendee.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_pm_general_application.pm_application_key_i = PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_application_key_i AND PUB_pm_general_application.pm_registration_office_n = PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_registration_office_n AND NOT pm_general_application.pm_gen_app_delete_flag_l = 1 AND ( PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c LIKE 'A%' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c LIKE 'H%' ) AND PUB_pc_extra_cost.pc_conference_key_n = PUB_pc_attendee.pc_conference_key_n AND PUB_pc_extra_cost.p_partner_key_n = PUB_pc_attendee.p_partner_key_n AND AuthorisingUnit.p_partner_key_n = PUB_pc_extra_cost.pc_authorising_field_n
